title: What do you expect from the final 2020 presidential debate? - Quora
tags: Politics of the United States of America

response.answer_text: Well first of all, I expect trump to come up with another attempt to call it off. He knows that he doesn’t have strong enough arguments on many of his positions, and is very vulnerable to attack on his covid response and his tax avoidance in particular. But he also discovered last time, that a strategy of trying to bully his way through the debate and avoid those issues by constant interruption, played REALLY badly with the public. If it does go ahead, I suspect the tactic from trump might be to do what pence did in his debate - literally answer a different question than the one asked. He’ll also try to use the whole “Hunter’s laptop” nonsense to discredit him.

Multi-Millionaire Biden will swear he never made over $400K again, doesn’t know anything about his Son becoming a millionaire, or his Brothers (Most Dad’s would ask and brag on their sons, but Joe never asked) Trump will verbally cut people off that won’t give him time, Biden will outright refuse to answer some questions (He doesn’t work for us, he said so) and Trump will be asked to denounce White Supremacy. Funny, they heard him say White Supremacy and the KKK, but they forgot the KKK because they are trying to associate White Supremacy with Trump. They don’t mention the KKK, David Duke, Byrd, and the boys in pointy hats.
